name: Sabrina Trinidad Panlilio
text: Honest question. Since the death penalty will only apply to drug related crimes, if a guy drugs a girl's drink then rapes her, would that count?

source_obj.text: Honest question. Since the death penalty will only apply to drug related crimes, if a guy drugs a girl's drink then rapes her, would that count?

replies.text: Given backwards thinking in legislature, the girl might be the one in trouble because "she took the drugs." Victim blaming culture much?
That would be funny if it wasn't so believable
